formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: px from pt \( \text{px} = \text{pt} \times \frac{\text{DPI}}{72} \) pt from px \( \text{pt} = \text{px} \times \frac{72}{\text{DPI}} \) At DPI = 96: pt → px = pt × 1.3333…
